casebody.data:
COUNTY OF INGHAM, County of Jackson, and County of Calhoun, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
MICHIGAN COUNTY ROAD COMMISSION SELF-INSURANCE POOL, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156980
COA: 334077 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 6, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiffs-appellees to strike the brief of amici curiae is DENIED.
